SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwBMWerewolfAttacked

ref ActorRef

ref potentialAttacker
Begin Function{ActorRef}
	if(GetStage fbmwBMWildHunt < 10)||(GetStage fbmwBMWildHunt > 100)  ;experimental fix for combat
		Let potentialAttacker := GetFirstRef 35  
		while (potentialattacker)
			if(potentialattacker.GetIsCreature != 1)&&(potentialattacker.GetDead == 0)  ; to avoid permanent detection values to dead npcs
				if(potentialattacker.GetDetectionLevel ActorRef == 3)&&(potentialattacker.GetInFaction fbmwbmWerewolfFaction == 0) ; so they will attack only when they "see" you
					if(potentialattacker.GetActorValue Aggression >= potentialattacker.GetDisposition ActorRef); to avoid being attacked by non morroblivion npcs
						potentialAttacker.StartCombat ActorRef
					endif
				endif
			endif

			Let potentiAlattacker := GetNextRef
		loop
	endif

End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 792 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
